author: tersec
content:
Attempting to sync just with Geth on Ropsten (for this test, no CL involved, fresh sync, default sync mode) and it seems to have stopped at 
> > eth.getBlockByNumber(12350647).totalDifficulty
> > eth.getBlockByNumber(12350648)
> null
where `0xb170ba09b382a8 == 49945015206773416`, less than the TTD. Enabling `debug.verbosity(4)` in Geth logs, it's looping around
```
DEBUG[06-19|15:07:21.362] Recalculated msgrate QoS values          proto=eth  rtt=2s           confidence=1.000 ttl=6s            next=2022-06-19T15:07:23+0000
DEBUG[06-19|15:07:22.681] Revalidated node                         b=10 id=a3d5a2a64af3d395 checks=41
DEBUG[06-19|15:07:24.641] Fetching batch of headers                id=18a0fa1213676f63 conn=dyndial count=192  fromnum=12,350,711 skip=0   reverse=false
DEBUG[06-19|15:07:24.641] Recalculated msgrate QoS values          proto=eth  rtt=2s           confidence=1.000 ttl=6s            next=2022-06-19T15:07:26+0000
DEBUG[06-19|15:07:27.920] Fetching batch of headers                id=18a0fa1213676f63 conn=dyndial count=192  fromnum=12,350,711 skip=0   reverse=false
DEBUG[06-19|15:07:27.921] Recalculated msgrate QoS values          proto=eth  rtt=2s           confidence=1.000 ttl=6s            next=2022-06-19T15:07:29+0000
DEBUG[06-19|15:07:29.872] Revalidated node                         b=16 id=6498b680504e0005 checks=16
DEBUG[06-19|15:07:31.199] Fetching batch of headers                id=18a0fa1213676f63 conn=dyndial count=192  fromnum=12,350,711 skip=0   reverse=false
DEBUG[06-19|15:07:31.199] Recalculated msgrate QoS values          proto=eth  rtt=2s           confidence=1.000 ttl=6s            next=2022-06-19T15:07:33+0000
```

author: tersec
content: 12350647 is https://ropsten.etherscan.io/block/0x72540e8e4ba9a75caf03ca9dfed46fcfc79fd7032e2989689ccd66ad8e84949d and it agrees with the TD there -- the next block, https://ropsten.etherscan.io/block/12350648 has a TD of  49,945,888,810,944,779, also less than TTD, so I'm not sure why it stopped at 12350647
